item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jeroen Peters Name Directory plugin <=Â 1.27.1 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-32126|2024-08-02T02:06:44.036Z -- jeroen%20peters -- navigation%20menu%20as%20dropdown%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jeroen Peters Navigation menu as Dropdown Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Navigation menu as Dropdown Widget: from n/a through 1.3.4.
